sentences.english: Non-Marxist approach to read on capital.
sentences.chinese: 以非馬克思主義態度對待《資本論》。

sentences.english: Marx had summarized his credit theory in the "Das Kapital".
sentences.chinese: 馬克思在《資本論》中集中論述了其信用思想。

sentences.english: Carl's "Das Kapital" this serves as an absolutely stunning.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾的《資本論》堪爲驚世絕本。

sentences.english: Capital is a suitable book for writers and literary youth.
sentences.chinese: 《資本論》也是文學家和文學青年的適宜讀物。

sentences.english: In addition to similes, Marx employs a lot of metaphors in Capital.
sentences.chinese: 在資本論中不僅有大量明喻，而且還有許多隱喻。

sentences.english: Wang Maoyin iS the only perSon who waS mentioned by Marx in hiS "The Capital".
sentences.chinese: 王茂蔭是馬克思在《資本論》中唯一提到的中國人。
